result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anton Lorenzo McDaniels Sr.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 3:02 PM Defendant Anton Lorenzo McDaniels Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Matter to be set for indigency hearing.
Attorney Refusal Letter from State Public Defender Office
Adjourned initial appearance on October 24, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

03:22 PM Defendant Anton Lorenzo McDaniels Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kevin M Smith appeared by video for Anton Lorenzo McDaniels Sr.  Prosecuting attorney Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, address and date of birth verified, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Cash bond set of $3000.00   with conditions, No contact directly or indirectly with victims E.B. or J.G., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. Curfew from 6pm-6am unless at work or traveling to and from work. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint with GPS monitoring.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. No non residents in home unless emergency responders if needed. Adjourned initial appearance October 24, 2022 at 3:00 pm .
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Risk Report

No contact directly or indirectly with victims E.B. or J.G., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. Curfew from 6pm-6am unless at work or traveling to and from work. Court orders Level 4 supervision through JusticePoint with GPS monitoring.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. No non residents in home unless emergency responders if needed.
